Class NightActionsResults

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.resource.AbstractResource
it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.resource.NightActionsResults
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
public class NightActionsResults extends AbstractResource
Represents the results of night actions in the game.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
LupusInFabula Group
